title: 042 - Selma Theighak
description: On today's show, Nick stands in solidarity for the entire episode because he doesn't like Connor's choice of attire, the guys dive into a couple of shows on Netflix that they've been bingeing, take a peek into Salma Hayel's film career, and Connor has a few updates in the ongoing rivalry between him and the tenants who accompany the space underneath him. Don't forget to send questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
